entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 12:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
